message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AR, cs.CV

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper proposes a framework for distributed training of neural networks on clusters of computational storage devices, which falls under the scope of distributed and cluster computing. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper discusses the use of computational storage devices, which have specialized hardware accelerators and eliminate data movement between the host and storage, resulting in improved performance and power savings. This falls under the scope of data structures and algorithms. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a framework for training neural networks, which falls under the scope of machine learning. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper discusses the use of computational storage devices, which have specialized hardware accelerators, and proposes a framework for in-storage processing style of training. This falls under the scope of hardware architecture. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper discusses the experimental results of the proposed framework on image classification tasks, which falls under the scope of computer vision and pattern recognition.
